bike.description: FSR technology, M4 Manipulated alloy frame with Transform monocoque TT, sealed cart. Bearings, disc compatible, 100mm travel, repl. der. hanger, two sets of water bottle bosses

components.description: Fox Float Triad. Custom on the fly three position switch 1) Lock-out, 2) Open, 3) ProPedal pedal assisting damping. External rebound adjust, Twin sleeve design for increased volume. 6.5x1.5"
